Summary: This Alien is the third one, I have drawings of the other one as well all at different dew fact!!!illings.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in bed and had been asleep at the time. i knew someone was in the room because this has happened more time then I would like. I scare it more then it did me. he or it did not expect me to awake. it was talking to the others in the ship. I have a drawing of it and the very first one I was abducted by to. I have never reported them because I did not know where and I did not think anyone would believe me. I have been abducted twice and have meet 3 different species of aliens. i will take a lie detective test if you wish and I will pass with flying colors. I have filled most of your paper work out, but i am much better at telling and talking to someone. i still remember most of all of them and have written them down as well. You may not believe me but ever word I will tell you is all true. Thank you for your time Lorena Simon 623-933-6767 P>S I live by and air force base as well and that is not good in the future. I am sending you a drawing of the very first Alien that took me to there ship and came back again 11-21-09 to take me again. They said they will be back again and know how to find me no matter where I go.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in El Mirage
There were no other sightings in El Mirage on or around January 7th 2011
